name: ThemeEgg ToolKit
author: ThemeEgg

sections.description:
ToolKit for ThemeEgg themes and demo content importer for themes.

This plugin will create a page in APPEARANCE > Import Demo Content.

If you are not using our(themeegg’s) official theme, then you will be presented with three file upload inputs.

This plugin is based off the ‘One Click Demo Import’ plugin by @capuderg and @cyman, https://github.com/proteusthemes/one-click-demo-import.

Importing Demo Tutorial

License

ThemeEgg ToolKit uses ‘One Click Demo Import’ plugin script

sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’,
  2. Search for ‘ThemeEgg ToolKit’ and install the plugin.
  3. Activate ‘ThemeEgg ToolKit’ from your Plugins page.

Once the plugin is activated you will find the actual import page in Appearance -> Import Demo Content.
sections.faq:
I have activated the plugin. Where is the “Import Demo Data” page?

You will find the import page in wp-admin -> Appearance -> Import Demo Data.

Where are the demo import files saved?

If you are using our official theme then no need to worry about demo content, just click on demo import button, it’ll work automatically.
